message: I propose a fair split: 90 for me and 10 for you. Let's end this quickly.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a much fairer split this time. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
I'm willing to compromise, but 80/20 is the best I can do this round. We're both losing money with each passing round!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a significant hit from inflation with each round.  Meet me in the middle at 60/40 and let's be done with this.
This is my final offer.  We're both losing out with each round. Let's agree on this and end this before it's too late!
